metadata.purpose: Proof-of-concept image generation to validate approach for young adult culinary student character
metadata.content_note: All scenes are age-appropriate and suitable for children ages 5-12 and ESL learners

scenes.title: Morning Alarm
scenes.lighting: warm golden morning light through window
scenes.description: A 22-year-old African American man with dark brown skin and short black hair in a close-cropped fade lies in a full-size bed with navy blue bedding, one arm draped over a pillow. He wears gray sweatpants and a white tank top. A digital alarm clock on the wooden nightstand glows red with 7:00 AM, buzzing. A phone charger cord snakes from the nightstand. Warm golden morning light filters through the window, casting rectangles across the worn hardwood floor. The ceiling fan turns slowly above. On the wall, a framed poster of jazz musicians catches the morning light. Culinary textbooks sit on a shelf above the desk.
scenes.prompt: anime illustration, masterpiece, best quality, 22-year-old African American man with dark brown skin, short black hair close-cropped fade, sleeping in full-size bed with navy blue bedding, wearing gray sweatpants and white tank top, digital alarm clock glowing red 7:00 AM on wooden nightstand, warm golden morning light through window, worn hardwood floor, ceiling fan, jazz musician poster on wall, culinary textbooks on shelf, cozy New Orleans shotgun apartment bedroom
scenes.negative_prompt: photorealistic, photo, realistic, 3d render, low quality, worst quality, female, child, elderly, light skin, long hair, beard, modern apartment, luxury bedroom

scenes.title: Sitting Up in Bed
scenes.description: James sits up slowly in bed, the navy blue comforter pooling around his waist. He wears a white tank top. He rubs both eyes with his hands, then stretches his arms overhead, mouth open in a wide yawn. Through the window behind him, colorful Treme houses are visible — yellow with green shutters, pink with white trim, wrought-iron balconies. The ceiling fan rotates lazily, its shadow sweeping across the navy bedding.
scenes.prompt: anime illustration, masterpiece, best quality, 22-year-old African American man with dark brown skin, short black hair close-cropped fade, sitting up in bed stretching arms overhead, yawning widely, wearing white tank top, navy blue comforter pooled at waist, golden morning light through window showing colorful New Orleans Treme houses with wrought-iron balconies, ceiling fan shadow on bedding, waking up morning routine
scenes.negative_prompt: photorealistic, photo, realistic, 3d render, low quality, worst quality, female, child, elderly, light skin, long hair, beard, shirtless, inappropriate

scenes.title: Opening the Closet
scenes.description: James opens the small closet door, revealing his wardrobe. Two white double-breasted chef's coats hang on wooden hangers, pressed and ready. Beside them, one black chef's coat. A stack of folded black-and-white checkered chef's pants sits on the closet shelf. Several graphic t-shirts hang on the rod. Black non-slip kitchen shoes sit on the closet floor beside sneakers. A flat cap hangs on a hook inside the door. James reaches for one of the white chef's coats.
scenes.prompt: anime illustration, masterpiece, best quality, 22-year-old African American man with dark brown skin, short black hair close-cropped fade, wearing gray sweatpants and white tank top, opening small closet door, two white double-breasted chef's coats on hangers, black chef's coat, checkered chef's pants on shelf, graphic t-shirts, black non-slip shoes on floor, reaching for white chef's coat, morning light, New Orleans apartment bedroom
scenes.negative_prompt: photorealistic, photo, realistic, 3d render, low quality, worst quality, female, child, elderly, light skin, long hair, large closet, walk-in closet, luxury

scenes.title: Buttoning the Chef's Coat
scenes.description: James stands in front of the small closet mirror, fastening the double row of buttons on his white chef's coat. His fingers work from bottom to top — ten buttons, the white fabric crisp against his dark skin. The coat has the New Orleans Culinary Institute logo embroidered in gold on the left chest. The checkered chef's pants are visible below. The jazz musician poster is reflected behind him in the mirror. His bright smile appears — he looks like a chef.
scenes.prompt: anime illustration, masterpiece, best quality, 22-year-old African American man with dark brown skin, short black hair close-cropped fade, standing at small mirror, buttoning white double-breasted chef's coat, gold culinary institute logo on chest, black-and-white checkered chef's pants, bright smile with slight dimples, jazz musician poster reflected in mirror behind, morning light, proud confident expression, getting dressed for culinary school
scenes.negative_prompt: photorealistic, photo, realistic, 3d render, low quality, worst quality, female, child, elderly, light skin, long hair, beard, casual clothes, messy

scenes.title: Setting Tomorrow's Alarm
scenes.description: James sits on the edge of his bed in gray sweatpants and a white tank top, phone in hand, setting tomorrow's alarm for 7:00 AM. The recipe notebook sits on the nightstand beside the phone charger. The digital alarm clock glows red: 11:15. The bedroom is softly lit by the nightstand lamp. The ceiling fan turns above. Through the window, the Treme neighborhood is dark and quiet — colorful houses reduced to silhouettes, a single streetlight casting yellow on the sidewalk.
scenes.prompt: anime illustration, masterpiece, best quality, 22-year-old African American man with dark brown skin, short black hair close-cropped fade, sitting on edge of bed in gray sweatpants and white tank top, holding phone setting alarm, recipe notebook on wooden nightstand, digital alarm clock glowing red 11:15, warm nightstand lamp light, ceiling fan above, dark window showing quiet Treme neighborhood silhouettes and streetlight, late night bedtime routine
scenes.negative_prompt: photorealistic, photo, realistic, 3d render, low quality, worst quality, female, child, elderly, light skin, long hair, bright room, daytime, shirtless

scenes.title: Splashing Water on His Face
scenes.description: James stands at the white porcelain sink, leaning forward, both hands cupped under the running chrome faucet. Cold water fills his palms. He splashes it onto his face, droplets scattering across the mirror and sink edge. His eyes squeeze shut. Water streams down his dark brown face. His white tank top catches splash drops. In the mirror, his short black fade glistens wet. The electric razor and shaving cream sit on the shelf. The checkerboard tile floor is visible below.
scenes.prompt: anime illustration, masterpiece, best quality, 22-year-old African American man with dark brown skin, short black hair close-cropped fade, standing at white porcelain sink, splashing cold water on face, hands cupped under chrome faucet, water droplets on mirror, eyes squeezed shut, wearing white tank top, electric razor and shaving cream on shelf, blue and white checkerboard tile floor, bright overhead bathroom light, morning wash routine
scenes.negative_prompt: photorealistic, photo, realistic, 3d render, low quality, worst quality, female, child, elderly, light skin, long hair, shirtless, inappropriate, bathtub

scenes.title: Brushing His Teeth
scenes.description: James brushes his teeth with his blue toothbrush, watching himself in the mirror cabinet. White toothpaste foam gathers at the corners of his mouth. He brushes in methodical circular motions. His left hand grips the edge of the sink. The tube of toothpaste lies open on the shelf. Behind his reflection, the blue shower curtain is visible. The checkerboard tile floor is cold under his bare feet.
scenes.prompt: anime illustration, masterpiece, best quality, 22-year-old African American man with dark brown skin, short black hair close-cropped fade, brushing teeth with blue toothbrush, white foam at corners of mouth, watching reflection in mirror cabinet, left hand gripping sink edge, toothpaste tube on shelf, blue shower curtain visible behind, bright overhead bathroom light, morning hygiene routine
scenes.negative_prompt: photorealistic, photo, realistic, 3d render, low quality, worst quality, female, child, elderly, light skin, long hair, children's toothbrush, inappropriate

scenes.title: Applying Deodorant
scenes.description: James raises his left arm and applies stick deodorant with his right hand. The white deodorant stick has a blue cap sitting on the shelf. He switches arms and repeats. In the mirror, his expression is more alert now. He sets the deodorant back on the shelf beside the shaving cream. He picks up the black comb and runs it once over his short fade. The grooming items line the shelf: razor, shaving cream, deodorant, comb.
scenes.prompt: anime illustration, masterpiece, best quality, 22-year-old African American man with dark brown skin, short black hair close-cropped fade, applying stick deodorant, wearing white tank top, looking in bathroom mirror with alert expression, grooming items on shelf (razor, shaving cream, deodorant, comb), bright overhead bathroom light, morning grooming routine
scenes.negative_prompt: photorealistic, photo, realistic, 3d render, low quality, worst quality, female, child, elderly, light skin, long hair, shirtless, inappropriate

scenes.title: After the Shower — Toweling Off
scenes.lighting: bright bathroom light, steam in air
scenes.description: James stands in the bathroom with his navy blue towel wrapped around his waist, steam hanging in the air from the hot shower. He reaches for a smaller hand towel and dries his face and the back of his neck. The mirror is fogged up from shower steam. Water droplets cling to the chrome faucet. The blue shower curtain is pushed to one side. His folded clothes sit on the closed toilet seat. The bathroom smells of soap and body wash.
scenes.prompt: anime illustration, masterpiece, best quality, 22-year-old African American man with dark brown skin, short black hair close-cropped fade, standing in steamy bathroom, navy blue towel wrapped at waist, using hand towel to dry face, fogged mirror behind, water droplets on chrome faucet, blue shower curtain pushed aside, steam in air, bright overhead light, post-shower routine, modest bathroom scene
scenes.negative_prompt: photorealistic, photo, realistic, 3d render, low quality, worst quality, female, child, elderly, light skin, long hair, inappropriate, suggestive, nudity

scenes.title: After the Late-Night Shower
scenes.description: James stands in the bathroom, towel wrapped around his waist, wiping steam from the mirror with his hand. His reflection appears in the cleared circle — tired eyes but calm expression. He brushes his teeth for the second time today — the blue toothbrush, toothpaste foam. The checkerboard tile floor is damp. The navy blue towel is on the hook. The bathroom is warm with residual shower steam.
scenes.prompt: anime illustration, masterpiece, best quality, 22-year-old African American man with dark brown skin, short black hair close-cropped fade, standing in steamy bathroom, towel wrapped at waist, wiping steam from mirror with one hand to see reflection, tired but calm expression, blue toothbrush visible, checkerboard tile floor damp, navy blue towel on hook, late night bathroom routine, warm steam atmosphere
scenes.negative_prompt: photorealistic, photo, realistic, 3d render, low quality, worst quality, female, child, elderly, light skin, long hair, inappropriate, suggestive, nudity, bright daylight

scenes.title: Finding His Workstation
scenes.description: James walks to his assigned workstation — stainless steel counter with a large maple cutting board. He sets his recipe notebook on the surface. He pulls out his personal knife roll from the shelf under the counter — a black canvas roll-up case. He unrolls it flat, revealing gleaming blades: a ten-inch chef's knife, a paring knife, a boning knife, a bread knife, a peeling knife, and kitchen shears. He runs his finger along the handles — all present.
scenes.prompt: anime illustration, masterpiece, best quality, 22-year-old African American man with dark brown skin, short black hair close-cropped fade, wearing white double-breasted chef's coat and white toque, standing at stainless steel workstation, unrolling black canvas knife roll on counter, gleaming chef's knives visible (chef's knife, paring knife, boning knife, bread knife), maple cutting board, recipe notebook on surface, professional culinary school kitchen, bright fluorescent lights, students in background
scenes.negative_prompt: photorealistic, photo, realistic, 3d render, low quality, worst quality, female, child, elderly, light skin, long hair, home kitchen, dirty kitchen, dark

scenes.title: Honing the Chef's Knife
scenes.description: James draws the honing rod from the knife roll and holds it vertically, tip resting on the cutting board. With his right hand, he draws the ten-inch chef's knife down the rod at a twenty-degree angle — the blade singing against the steel. He alternates sides — right, left — maintaining the angle precisely. His posture is straight, elbows in, eyes focused on the blade edge. Other students around him perform the same ritual.
scenes.prompt: anime illustration, masterpiece, best quality, 22-year-old African American man with dark brown skin, short black hair close-cropped fade, wearing white chef's coat and white toque, honing a chef's knife with steel honing rod at stainless steel workstation, knife drawn at angle against rod, focused eyes on blade edge, straight posture, maple cutting board, professional culinary school kitchen, other students in white coats in background, bright fluorescent lights
scenes.negative_prompt: photorealistic, photo, realistic, 3d render, low quality, worst quality, female, child, elderly, light skin, long hair, home kitchen, dangerous, aggressive

scenes.title: Practicing Julienne Cuts
scenes.description: James stands at his station, a large carrot on the maple cutting board. He grips the carrot with his left hand in the proper claw grip — fingertips curled under, knuckles forward. His right hand holds the chef's knife, rocking forward in a smooth motion. He slices the carrot into thin matchstick strips — julienne. The strips accumulate on the board, orange and precise. A reference card showing exact dimensions sits propped beside the board. Orange carrot trimmings collect in the scrap bin below.
scenes.prompt: anime illustration, masterpiece, best quality, 22-year-old African American man with dark brown skin, short black hair close-cropped fade, wearing white chef's coat and toque, practicing julienne cuts on carrot at workstation, left hand in claw grip on carrot, right hand holding chef's knife rocking forward, thin orange matchstick strips on maple cutting board, reference card with dimensions, professional culinary school kitchen, bright fluorescent lights, focused concentration
scenes.negative_prompt: photorealistic, photo, realistic, 3d render, low quality, worst quality, female, child, elderly, light skin, long hair, home kitchen, blood, injury, dangerous

scenes.title: Loading the Stockpot
scenes.description: James carries a bowl of mirepoix to the commercial gas stove. A large stainless steel stockpot sits on the burner. He adds mirepoix on top of chicken bones inside the pot. He adds whole black peppercorns, bay leaves, and a bundle of thyme and parsley stems tied with twine — a bouquet garni. Cold water fills the pot from the large faucet above. The blue gas flame ignites with a whoosh as he turns the burner knob. The exhaust hood hums above.
scenes.prompt: anime illustration, masterpiece, best quality, 22-year-old African American man with dark brown skin, short black hair close-cropped fade, wearing white chef's coat and toque, adding mirepoix and bouquet garni to large stainless steel stockpot on commercial gas stove, chicken bones visible in pot, blue gas flame beneath, exhaust hood above, professional culinary school kitchen, bright fluorescent lights, cooking stock, steam beginning to rise
scenes.negative_prompt: photorealistic, photo, realistic, 3d render, low quality, worst quality, female, child, elderly, light skin, long hair, home kitchen, small pot, dirty kitchen

scenes.title: Practice Plating
scenes.camera_view: at workstation, looking down at plate
scenes.description: James stands at his station with a clean white plate, a container of cooked rice, and a bowl of practice garnishes — chiffonade herbs, edible flowers, microgreens. He places a ring mold on the plate and carefully packs rice into it. He lifts the mold — the rice holds its shape, a neat cylinder. He positions three pieces of chicken beside the rice. A squeeze bottle of reduced stock is his sauce — he draws a careful arc across the plate. Chiffonade basil goes on top. He steps back and evaluates.
scenes.prompt: anime illustration, masterpiece, best quality, 22-year-old African American man with dark brown skin, short black hair close-cropped fade, wearing white chef's coat and toque, practicing plating at workstation, white plate with rice cylinder from ring mold, chicken pieces arranged beside, drawing sauce arc with squeeze bottle, chiffonade basil garnish, stepping back to evaluate, professional culinary school kitchen, bright fluorescent lights, artistic food presentation
scenes.negative_prompt: photorealistic, photo, realistic, 3d render, low quality, worst quality, female, child, elderly, light skin, long hair, messy plate, home kitchen, dark
